SELECT d.device_id,d.`device_number`,d.`investor_id`, di.`investor_id` AS userInvestorId FROM device AS d INNER JOIN device_investor AS di ON di.device_number = d.device_number WHERE di.Id IN

SELECT d.device_id,d.`device_number`,d.`investor_id`, di.`investor_id` AS userInvestorId FROM device AS d INNER JOIN device_investor AS di ON di.device_number = d.device_number WHERE di.Id = #{id}

SELECT IFNULL(su.`proportion`,0) AS suProportion, IFNULL(h.`proportion`,0) AS hProportion,IFNULL(SUM(di.`proportion`),0) AS diProportion FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON d.`user_id` = su.`user_id` LEFT JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = d.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN device_investor AS di ON di.`device_number` = d.`device_number` WHERE d.device_number = #{deviceNumber}

SELECT (100-IFNULL(dh.`proportion`,0)-IFNULL(d.`investor_proportion`,0) - IFNULL(su.proportion,0)) AS totalProportion FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.`user_id` = d.`user_id` LEFT JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = d.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN device_hospital AS dh ON dh.`device_number` = d.`device_number` WHERE d.device_number = #{deviceNumber}
and h.type = #{type}

SELECT su.`user_id`,su.`user_name`,su.`nick_name`, su.`proportion`,su.`phone_number` FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.`user_id` = d.`user_id` WHERE d.`device_number` = #{deviceNumber} AND su.`parent_id` = 0

SELECT h.hospital_id,h.hospital_name,h.proportion,su.`user_name`,su.`nick_name`,IFNULL(d.`investor_proportion`,0) AS investorProportion FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN hospital AS h ON d.`hospital_id` = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN hospital_user AS hu ON hu.hospital_id = h.hospital_id LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.`user_name` = hu.user_name WHERE d.`device_number` = #{deviceNumber}

SELECT su.user_id,su.`user_name`,su.`nick_name`,su.`proportion`, su.`phone_number` FROM device AS d INNER JOIN device_investor AS di ON di.device_number = d.`device_number` INNER JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.`user_id` = di.investor_id WHERE d.`device_number` = #{deviceNumber} AND su.`parent_id` = 0

SELECT (100 - IFNULL(d.`investor_proportion`,0)-IFNULL(h.`proportion`,0)) AS totalProportion FROM sys_user AS su left JOIN device AS d ON d.`user_id` = su.`user_id` left JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = d.`hospital_id` WHERE su.`user_id` = #{userId}

SELECT d.device_id, d.device_type_id, d.device_number, d.device_iot_number,d.device_mac, d.device_deposit, d.billing_id,d.hospital_id, d.device_qR_code, d.device_address,content, d.device_full_address,d.`rows`,d.heart_time, d.create_time, d.status,d.investor_id,d.electric, d.electric_early,d.user_id,d.investor_proportion,d.telecom_id, su.`proportion` AS agentProportion FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN sys_user AS su ON su.`user_id` = d.`user_id` WHERE d.device_number = #{deviceNumber}

SELECT d.`device_number`,d.`hospital_id`,h.`type`, d.`user_id`,d.`investor_proportion` FROM device AS d LEFT JOIN hospital AS h ON h.`hospital_id` = d.`hospital_id` WHERE d.device_number = #{deviceNumber}
